system.description: The character opens a portal to another place.
system.effect: The character opens a glowing portal in a space next to them that moves anything that enters it between that space and its destination, which forms a matched glowing portal in the other place. The other end of the portal must be in a clear space in another dimension that the character has been to. Anything can move through the portal in either direction until it is closed, which the character can do at will.
